alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Lamar; Monroe; Pike; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 27 at 12:40AM EDT until March 27 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Bibb County in central Georgia... Pike County in west central Georgia... Monroe County in central Georgia... Upson County in west central Georgia... Crawford County in central Georgia... Northern Taylor County in west central Georgia... Lamar County in west central Georgia... * Until 200 AM EDT. * At 1240 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Gay to near Baughville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Barnesville, Forsyth, Zebulon, Roberta, Milner, Molena, Yatesville, Williamson, Orchard Hill, Meansville, Culloden, Aldora, Sunset Village, Lincoln Park, The Rock, Concord, Atwater, Logtown and Howard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Peachtree City. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Bibb; Crawford; Lamar; Monroe; Pike; Taylor; Upson
